One More MF5 Video
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): One More MF5 Video
By RPGDesigner on Thursday, December 8, 2005 - 04:23 pm:

One last video has been uploaded on the product page on the day of the game's official release. It reveals something very interesting.

http://www.tecmo.co.jp/product/mf5/movie.htm

When I say interesting, I mean monsters with 4-digit statistics.

By Apocalypse on Friday, December 9, 2005 - 12:59 pm:

That means the new max may be 9999! I cant even get to 999 :(

By RPGDesigner on Friday, December 9, 2005 - 01:06 pm:

It seems to me like they did this as an alternate method for preventing maxxing, forcing people to raise their monsters' stats more selectively instead of nerfing combined stats.

I'll find out once I start playing. The game's been staring at me since it arrived at my door. It will drink my coke.
